rooms.description: The entrance hallway sets the tone with a modern eco-friendly design and natural lighting, ensuring compliance with local building norms.
A spacious living area designed for comfort with energy-efficient windows and insulation following Vastu guidelines.
An integrated dining space adjoining the living room, optimized for family gatherings.
The kitchen is designed with eco-friendly appliances and efficient layout ensuring adherence to local building standards.
A transitional space that connects the living room to outdoor areas, enhancing natural ventilation.

openings.description: Energy-efficient door that maintains interior temperature.
Large windows to maximize natural light and ensure proper ventilation following Vastu principles.
Window to enhance cross-ventilation in the kitchen area.

other_features.description: A large garden integrated with native plants and sustainable irrigation systems.
An eco-friendly swimming pool designed for relaxation while ensuring efficient water usage.
